name: Magical Escape VR
description:
Do you want to practice your magic? Then come and try "Magical escape"! You have disrupted the plans of a powerful magician who then challenges you to leave his dungeon. To be eligible to become the magician's apprentice, you must get out of the dungeon... by learning magic! To do this, you must find the 6 hidden keys to open the magic door. Can you meet all the challenges? 

Unique features: 

  • Movement based magic system 
  • Interactive fire system
  • Accurate hand interactions
  • Escape room
  • A multitude of special effects

This game was made for the Jan Jam 2022 (VR).
